item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://onlineornot.com/) - OnlineOrNot is a reliable uptime monitor for both JS-based web apps and websites. 10 uptime checks (for static websites and APIs - OnlineOrNot is a reliable uptime monitor for both JS-based web apps and websites. 10 uptime checks (for static websites and APIs) with a 5 minute interval, 1 browser check with a 15 minute interval. Free for up to 3 users, alerts via Slack, Discord, and Email.

item.title: Add GitGuardian to security tools
item.description: https://www.gitguardian.com - Keep secrets out of your source code with automated secrets detection and remediation. Scan your git repos for 350+ types of secrets and sensitive files – Free for individuals and teams of 25 developers or less.
